subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The marathoner Joan Benoit Samuelson, the figure skater Brian Boitano, the boxer Oscar De La Hoya and the volleyball player Karch Kiraly lead the list of this year’s inductees into the United States Olympic Hall of Fame. Other inductees include David Robinson (basketball), Bruce Baumgartner (wrestling). J. Michael Plumb (equestrian), Lones Wigger Jr. (shooting), Amy Van Dyken (swimming), John Morgan (Paralympic swimming), Carol Heiss Jenkins (figure skating, veteran), Carlo Fassi (figure skating, coach), Frank Marshall (special contributor) and the 1996 women’s gymnastics team (Shannon Miller, Dominique Dawes, Dominique Moceanu, Kerri Strug, Amanda Borden, Amy Chow and Jaycie Phelps). Induction is June 19.
